DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether Fludarabine in combination with cytarabine is more effective than high-dose cytarabine in post-remission therapy for patients with AML1-ETO acute myeloid leukemia.
DOC.brief_title: AML1-ETO Acute Myeloid Leukemia With Fludarabine and Cytarabine Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: Clinical and laboratory diagnosis of AML1ETO positive acute myeloid leukemia In status of complete remission after one to two courses of induction therapy with DA(Daunorubicin 60mg/m2/d for 3 days, cytarabine 100mg/m2/d for 57days) regimen ECOG (Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group) score: <2 Serious liver/ kidney dysfunction Cardiac function level: 2 above Female in pregnancy or lactation With serious infection diseases or other diseases
